pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Added button to select mesh file on inspector

content.raw:
I see what you mean, @iche033 do you think it's a good idea to check all fields in the inspector before sending them and in case something is invalid, open a dialog alerting the user instead of printing errors?

The crashing also happens for the `ImportDialog`, looking into it now.
content.html:
I see what you mean, @iche033 do you think it's a good idea to check all fields in the inspector before sending them and in case something is invalid, open a dialog alerting the user instead of printing errors?

The crashing also happens for the ImportDialog, looking into it now.
